description: Work permit expired while employee was on project in Labuan. Emergency legal intervention required.
Safety training lapsed. Employee denied office access for 3 days pending emergency recertification.
Laptop not returned after department transfer. Asset recovery team dispatched.
Regulatory Compliance L2 expired. Compliance department audit capacity reduced by 33% for 2 weeks.
MacBook Air overdue return. IT flagged as potential data security risk.
MacBook Pro not returned from Malta office. Cross-border asset recovery initiated.
